snippet: A teenager was sentenced Friday in Akron to life in prison without parole for his role in a deadly plot to lure men desperate for work with phony Craigslist job offers.
abstract: Brogan Rafferty, age 17, is sentenced in Akron, OH, to life in prison without parole for his role in deadly plot to lure men with phony Craigslist job offers, which led to deaths of three men and wounding of fourth.
lead_paragraph: A teenager was sentenced Friday in Akron to life in prison without parole for his role in a deadly plot to lure men desperate for work with phony Craigslist job offers.

headline.main: Ohio: Teen Gets Life in Craigslist Ploy
